title: Reconnecting  bug
body: why i cant reconnect how can i fix it and i get band because of this problem

replies.body: Those reconnect issues can happen from a pretty large number of reasons, but often they can be fixed by adjusting your firewall settings if that's the root cause. It's also good the start troubleshooting here since it's a relatively quick and easy step to test. [**Try these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3), and test them in a custom/practice game first. Let me know if you're still having problems reconnecting after this!
